suggestions.description: Design, develop, and maintain software applications and systems using various programming languages and technologies.

suggestions.description: Develop artificial intelligence and machine learning systems to solve complex problems and automate processes.
suggestions.reasoning: Your problem-solving abilities and interest in continuous learning make AI/ML engineering ideal, as it's a rapidly evolving field requiring logical thinking.
